patthana1.10:216.2: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā cetanā;
patthana1.10:216.7: vatthuṃ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā cetanā. #1
patthana1.10:217.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.10:218.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.10:219.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.10:219.2: dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā;
patthana1.10:219.3: vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca paccayā sampayuttakā cetanā. #1
patthana1.10:220.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.10:220.2: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā cetanā;
patthana1.10:220.3: uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca mohañca paccayā sampayuttakā cetanā. #1
patthana1.10:222.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā (paripuṇṇaṃ, paṭisandhi natthi), naāhārapaccayā—

patthana1.10:229.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā sattarasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte terasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte ekādasa, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.

patthana1.10:257.2: uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca mohañca saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā. #1

patthana1.10:261.2: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā;
patthana1.10:263.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā …
patthana1.10:266.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe ekādasa, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekādasa, samanantare ekādasa, sahajāte ekādasa, aññamaññe ekādasa, nissaye ekādasa, upanissaye ekādasa, purejāte ekādasa, āsevane ekādasa, kamme ekādasa, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre ekādasa, indriye ekādasa, jhāne ekādasa, magge ekādasa, sampayutte ekādasa, vippayutte ekādasa, atthiyā ekādasa, natthiyā ekādasa, vigate ekādasa, avigate ekādasa.
patthana1.10:271.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.10:272.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.10:273.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.10:273.2: ahetukaṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā.
patthana1.10:278.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā ekādasa, napurejāte ekādasa, napacchājāte ekādasa, naāsevane ekādasa, nakamme satta, navipāke ekādasa, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte ekādasa.
patthana1.10:281.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, navippayutte satta.
patthana1.10:284.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge dve, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.10:292.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:292.2: dassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.10:293.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:293.2: dassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.10:294.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:294.2: dassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.10:296.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana1.10:297.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:297.2: vicikicchāsahagato moho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.10:298.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:298.2: uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.10:299.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:299.2: vicikicchāsahagato moho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.10:300.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:300.2: uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #5
patthana1.10:302.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:302.3: taṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:302.5: taṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:302.6: Vicikicchaṃ ārabbha vicikicchā uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:302.7: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati. #1
patthana1.10:303.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:303.2: ariyā dassanena pahātabbahetuke pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe aniccato … pe …
patthana1.10:303.6: dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya mohassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.10:304.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:304.2: dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana1.10:305.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:305.3: taṃ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:305.4: Uddhaccaṃ ārabbha uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:305.5: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati. #1
patthana1.10:306.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:306.3: taṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:306.4: Uddhaccaṃ ārabbha diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.10:306.5: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati. #2
patthana1.10:307.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:307.2: ariyā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe aniccato … pe …
patthana1.10:307.6: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya mohassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.10:308.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:308.2: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti. #4
patthana1.10:309.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:309.2: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti. #5
patthana1.10:310.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:310.3: (vitthāretabbaṃ dassanattikasadisaṃ) āvajjanāya mohassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.10:311.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:312.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:313.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:313.2: cakkhuṃ ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana1.10:313.6: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti. #4
patthana1.10:314.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.10:314.5: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti. #5

Tisso pañhā, dassanena nayena vibhajitabbā, “uddhaccan”ti niyāmetabbaṃ) natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo ….
patthana1.10:429.1: Hetuyā ekādasa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare sattarasa, samanantare sattarasa, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe ekādasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, purejāte pañca, pacchājāte pañca, āsevane sattarasa, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte ekādasa, vippayutte nava, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā sattarasa, vigate sattarasa, avigate sattarasa.

patthana1.10:435.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.10:436.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.10:437.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.10:438.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.10:439.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #5
patthana1.10:440.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.10:441.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.10:442.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.10:443.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.10:444.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #5
patthana1.10:445.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.10:446.1: (Idha sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, missagataṃ atthi, pāḷiyaṃ kātabbaṃ. Gaṇanāya upadhāretvā gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana1.10:447.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana1.10:448.1: (Idhāpi ārammaṇapaccayā upanissayapaccayā atthi, pāḷiyaṃ natthi. Gaṇentena upadhāretvā gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana1.10:449.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.10:450.1: (Idhāpi “sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ” yaṃ missakapañhā atthi, pāḷiyaṃ kātabbaṃ.)
patthana1.10:451.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.10:452.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:453.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ.
patthana1.10:454.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.10:455.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #5
patthana1.10:456.1: (Idhāpi sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ atthi. Ye te pañhā na likhitā, te pāḷiyaṃ gaṇentānaṃ byañjanena na samenti. Te pāḷiyaṃ na likhitā gaṇanā pākaṭā honti. Yadi saṃsayo uppajjati, anulome atthipaccaye pekkhitabbaṃ.)
patthana1.10:460.1: Nahetuyā ekavīsa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare nasahajāte naaññamaññe nanissaye naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyā nonatthiyā novigate noavigate sabbattha ekavīsa.
patthana1.10:464.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekādasa, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare ekādasa, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekādasa, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā ekādasa, novigate ekādasa.
patthana1.10:468.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare sattarasa, samanantare sattarasa, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe ekādasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, purejāte pañca, pacchājāte pañca, āsevane sattarasa, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte ekādasa, vippayutte nava, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā sattarasa, vigate sattarasa, avigate sattarasa.
